page.title: 13RECREATION IN WELSHPOOL
page.content: Many of the clubs which cater for {outdoor recreation}such as the bowls, tennis, cricket, soccer and rugby clubs are located at the Maesydre Recreation Ground. Many{indoor activities}are located at the{Armoury Recreation Centre}which was opened in 1980 and is used by 40,000 people a year. Most popular of the activities is squash for men and keep fit for women. Other activities include badminton, karate, yoga, dominoes and archery. Local football teams use the main hall for training. Every year during August the Armoury holds a{Festival of Sport}which consists of 28 different sports and lasts the whole month. Also at the Armoury is a children's room and at weekends there is often a disco. There is also a{swimming pool,}a boxing club and a computer club.
